title: World Typographers T-shirts
content:
I was in a clothing store called [Uniqlo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090726115427/http:/www.uniqlo.com/us/stores/ny_soho_store.html) with some friends today. As we were leaving, I noticed a T-shirt that said “The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.” in something like Bodoni Poster Italic. We had to go, but I noted that there were some other T-shirt designs next to it and that brand of these shirts was World Typographers. Some of them look cool.

[http://ut.uniqlo.com/search#cat\_id=0&key\_id=35&key\_label=WORLD%20TYPOGRA...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090726115427/http:/ut.uniqlo.com/search#cat_id=0&key_id=35&key_label=WORLD%20TYPOGRAPHERS&gender=1_1_1&num=30&order=date&page=0 "http://ut.uniqlo.com/search#cat\_id=0&key\_id=35&key\_label=WORLD%20TYPOGRAPHERS&gender=1\_1\_1&num=30&order=date&page=0")  
 [http://www.hellogas.com/worldtypographers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090726115427/http:/www.hellogas.com/worldtypographers/ "http://www.hellogas.com/worldtypographers/")
author: Thomas Levine
